profile.name: Javier
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.description:
Hi, 

I'm Javier,  I'm 43 years old and I'm from Toledo but I live in Madrid from 1 year ago. 

I have around 15 years of experience in web development. 

I'm very curious guy so I learn a lot of things in this timeline, from product design to bakend languages, and of course all frontend ecosystem that you can imagine.

I like really good projects, quality, and enviroments to grow up and learn with my team.
